title: Softsoap Moisturizing Liquid Hand Soap, Soothing Clean Aloe Vera - 7.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 6)
description: Give your hands the soothing experience of Softsoap Liquid Hand Soap, Soothing Aloe Vera, to keep your hands feeling moisturized and clean. Wash away dirt and bacteria with Softsoap liquid hand soap gentle cleansing formula. At the sink or in your shower, enjoy delightful Softsoap brand product fragrances. Surprise your skin. Wow your senses. (The U.S. Center for Disease Control and Prevention states that keeping hands clean is one of the most important steps we can take. It is best to wash hands with soap and clean running water for 20 seconds.
